attributes.background: There are many hundreds of thousands of people who have come to this country with no intention of working or providing for themselves costing the taxpayer many billions of pounds per year. This money could be far better spent elsewhere on public services, the NHS and social care.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
